title: Ticket #1870: Make the starter able to spawn jobs under parrot
description:
Now that Condor's Chirp protocol is up to date with the Notre Dame implementation, parrot can be used for remote IO between the starter and shadow. Currently parrot, http://www.cse.nd.edu/~ccl/software/parrot/ has to be run as a submit job with the actual user job supplied in the arguments It would be convenient to have the starter spawn the user job under parrot.

To achieve this:

  • The full path to the parrot executable would need to be specified in the condor_config file.
  • A flag in the submit file would have to be specified, something like "UseParrot = true"

2011-Jan-25 12:25:08 by slauson:
There was one issue I ran into when testing this. In the submit file getenv must be set to true, otherwise parrot gets a NULL PATH variable and segfaults. I made a quick fix to parrot that resolves the issue, so I'll talk to Doug about adding the fix to the next parrot release.
